phrases: Last time on Fairy Tail...
We set out to find the parts of the clock, and arrived at a giant crypt underneath a desert.
But all kinds of traps were lying in wait for us there.
They are the ones from last time!
So you bastards are here too, huh?!
Samuel told us about The Key of the Starry Heavens.
And we know that a part of the clock is here.
It seems like you have not found the part yet either, huh?
Is not that Lulu-chama over there?!
Who you callin' Lulu-chama?!
He did not call you that before...
His pet name has gotten even more embarrassing...
Encountering each other like this...
It is a fated reunion, indeed!
It is proof that we are joined by the red string of fate!
That is not for you to decide!
L-O-V-E!
I am going to get you back for last time!
Roar...
I do not have time to bother with you.
Right now, I am facing a major turning point in my life!
Hot-hot-hot-hot-hot!
Lucy-neesan!
Natsu-nii, be careful!
Just like before, he is got that great nuisance of a shield!
Run!
Footprints of the Myth!
They are not chasing us...
Maybe we got lucky and they got buried.
Just like I planned!
You are such a liar!
Anyway, we have got to search for that part!
Oh-ho!
Lulu-chama, we need to establish the bond of love!
Would you stop calling me that?!
Dan-san!
Right now, finding that part takes priority!
We have an important duty to carry out!
I know!
But love is important, too!
You do not know...
L-O-V-E!
I am sick of hearin' that!
Hot-hot-hot-hot!
Nee-san is on fire!
Crap!
I did it again!
Anybody who dares interfere with two people in love
will get sliced up like a fish and put back together on the table!
I do not know what he means...
Feel the might of my magic spear, Happy Lucky!
Be careful, Natsu-san!
If you get hit, you will shrink again like last time!
I know it!
I do not want to get trampled by you again!
I am not done yet!
Nee-san!
What is this?!
Oh, no!
Forgive me!
I did not mean to do it!
I shrunk the woman that I love!
I-I am a failure as a lover!
If that is how you feel, then get me back to normal!
Of course!
W-What?!
This actually is not so bad!
A tiny Lulu-chama has a charm that I am reluctant to give up!
I think I will keep you like this as my mascot!
You got to be kidding me!
Nah, I think I will leave you like this.
And when I get home, I will put you on my desk and appreciate you at my leisure!
I am not room decoration!
This way, we will always be together.
He is made Lucy-nee into a strap!
But she is cute like this!
I kind of want one myself!
Stop talking stupid and help me!
Now, the woman that I love and I are one!
There is nothing that I fear!
So let us get back to what we were doing!
Dan-san, attack him later!
Right now, we have got to look for that part!
I have got him right where I want him!
You go on ahead!
Samuel-san did not tell me any of the details!
I cannot search without you, Dan-san!
What should we do?!
We have to hurry up and find that part, too!
But we cannot leave Lucy-neesan like that!
This is making me dizzy!
Oh, that is right!
The Celestial Spirits!
Gate of the Archer, I open thee!
Sagittarius!
You called-moshimoshi?
What is going on here-moshimoshi?
Since I, their owner, have been shrunken down, the Celestial Spirits are little, too?!
However, I have been summoned,
and it is the duty of a Celestial Spirit to aid the master, as it were-moshimoshi!
Take this!
I shall attack with all my might!
This is perfect!
I had a little bone caught between my teeth from the fish I had for breakfast this morning.
I attacked with all my might, but it had no effect on him, as it were-moshimoshi!
Now that I have got relief in my teeth, I am going to finish up here, starting with you!
Watch out, Sagittarius!
Sorry!
I stepped on another little one!
That is enough.
You can go back!
I apologize for not being of any use, as it were-moshimoshi!
We are not getting anywhere this way.
I have got it!
Dan-san, what would you say to getting married to Lucy-neesan right here?
Why would we do that?!
This is a holy place with a lot of history, is not it?
I think it would be perfect!
That is a good idea!
You know this is a graveyard...
Then let us figure out the bridal plan right away!
Right!
I will leave the details to you!
First, we will want to invite about 50 friends and relatives to the ceremony.
It looks like it will be a gorgeous wedding!
For your honeymoon, you will go on a'round-the-world cruise!
How romantic!
You two will be happily married for the rest of your lives
and will eventually become a constellation, the Married Lovebirds, that decorates the night sky!
That is wonderful!
The dawn of my life is near!
I cannot keep up with this...
L-O-V-E!
Do not forget about me!
What is this smell?
It stinks!
Romeo, you did this, did not you?!
Forgive me!
I am doing it to help you, Lucy-nee!
It stinks so bad, I cannot stand it!
The smoke is trapped in my armor and I think I am going to choke on it!
The red string that binds us...!
Lucy-nee!
Hot-hot-hot-hot!
How many times has this happened to me today?!
Lucy, get on!
Give me back my wife!
You saved me!
Happy, fly us right out of here!
Aye, sir!
I will return you to your original size!
That way, you will both fall from the weight!
I am back to normal!
Oh, no.
I missed the target again.
H-Happy is huge...
You suck!
Dumbass!
You are not really a master lancer or anything, are you?!
I cannot move!
Sorry!
I stepped on you again!
I bet you did that on purpose!
Are you sure this is the right place?!
This is where it said on the map you fools gave me!
I can run faster than anything on normal ground,
but I am out of my element climbing up a cliff!
Would not this be a lot easier if Lily just gave us a lift to the top?!
But if I did and there was a clue along the way, we would miss it.
It is no good choosing the easiest way.
Mm-mm.
Quit bitching!
I will leave you hangin' here!
Asshole.
He really ticks me off...
Hmm...
It seems like we are completely lost.
I think we have just been going around in circles.
What about the map?
It does not show the route in any detail.
There are just instructions to rely on the signs.
But it is weird.
If we keep going this way, we should reach our destination, right?
I wonder if the sign is wrong...
That or maybe someone messed with the sign, pointing it in the wrong direction...
That kind of prank would be in bad taste.
It is a crime to change the direction of a sign,
since if someone then makes a mistake, it can lead to a major accident.
But we should be close.
Let us keep moving forward carefully while consulting the map.
I wonder if it is just a prank...
Or someone purposefully trying to get us off track...
Do not move, Happy!
If I do not fly, I am likely to stomp on you again!
This is a precious cultural heritage site!
Do not carelessly destroy it!
Now's no time to worry about that!
What a pain!
Alrighty!
You are already back to normal.
Finally, everyone is back to normal!
Alright, let us look for that clock part!
Thank goodness!
But how can we find it when we do not even know where it is hidden?
It is okay.
I brought the book along for a time like this.
It might provide us with a clue that leads us to the part!
If I had that book, maybe I would even be able to find the part by myself!
Give me that book!
Stay back!
Whoa!
Now, while we have the chance!
Halt!
You halt!
I will kick his ass!
In the meantime, search for the part!
Got it!
Leave it to us!
Careful you do not get stepped on!
As long as you are not around, I are not gettin' stepped on!
Wait!
How dare you get in my way again!
This is going to be the last time!
Stop!
Get away from us!
Lucy-neesan, where is the part?!
Um... um... ow!
This again?!
What a time to run out of magic...
Hold this!
Grab on!
I refuse to accept mercy from the enemy!
Do not be stubborn!
Just hurry up!
Lucy-neesan, are you alright?!
I am in one piece...
Hold on!
I will come down to help you out!
No, do not!
Hurry up and find the part instead!
We will regroup somewhere eventually!
Will she really be okay?
After all, that Coco girl is down there with her...
Lucy has her Celestial Spirits, so I would say there is nothing to worry about.
Yeah.
Let us do as Lucy-nee told us.
Lucy-neesan, be careful!
You guys, too!
Ow...
Hey, are you alright?
Mind your own business!
If you had not reached out to me in the first place,
I would have been able to get back up on my own!
Is that how you talk to someone who tried to help you out?!
I never asked for any help!
You are not nice at all, are you?!
I know someone who looks just like you, but she is a good, honest girl!
Well, that is not me, so do not confuse me with her!
Hey, what are you people aiming to do anyway?
What are you going to do if you collect all the clock parts?
What do you mean by crusade and chaos?!
Like I would tell you!
The question is, why are you people getting in our way?!
We do not know what is going on, so we are just trying to investigate the situation!
Whatever you are trying to do, it is a waste of time!
A bunch of cut-rate wizards like you could never stop us!
Boy, is she nasty!
Be careful!
There could be a trap anywhere.
I know...
The traps are meant for tomb raiders like you and your friends.
You are doing the same thing we are!
Look out!
Th-Thanks!
No need to thank me.
I was just paying you back for trying to help me before.
You really are not honest about your feelings.
Even though you have the same face and the same speed as the Coco from Edolas...
Is she really that much like me?
Yeah.
I mean, you really are just about the same person.
It is a long story, but in the beginning, we were enemies, too.
In the end, though, we became friends.
Well, that is where we differ.
There is no way you and I are going to be friends.
Look, it is not as if we want to interfere with you.
We just think that if it is going to cause trouble for a great number of people,
we have to put a stop to it.
Is that your aim?
Well, in my case, I also want to find out what my father was thinking.
Your father... Mr. Jude Heartfilia, right?
He was supposed to be a brilliant entrepreneur, I believe...
I am his daughter, but I did not really know him well...
I am perplexed as to why he would even go through the trouble of hiding the parts...
But I wish he would have been a little more empathetic about the people hunting them down.
Well, I am with you on that one.
What is funny?
Oh, nothing.
I was just thinking you are a funny girl.
Is that an insult?
No, I did not mean it like that...
Huh?
A dead end...
I wonder if we should retrace our steps...
Not a deep thinker, are you?
There is always some kind of switch in a place like this.
Do not touch that!
Coco!
Coco!
Hang in there!
Lucy!
Thank goodness!
You are alright!
Okay!
We will pull you up!
You should have just left that jerk as she was!
Never mind!
Let us just hurry up and look for the part!
According to Lucy, the clock part should be right here...
I do not see anything that looks like it could be part of a clock.
We finally made it...
The air's thin up here...
And it is cold!
We are not got time to take a break.
Let us search for that part!
Please, just a few minutes...
I cannot even take a single step...
I am starving...
Oh, no!
We are on the wrong mountain!
The part's on the mountain over there!
We have got to climb up that one!
No way!
Just kidding...
I meant to encourage everyone with my little joke...
but it seems to have had the opposite effect.
I am not seeing anythin' like a part.
Which means it is probably buried somewhere'round here...
What are you going to do?
This is it!
We have found it at last!
It is said that this place contains books on magic from all times and places...
The Magic Library...
Another huge building...
But it looks like not many people come here...
What a waste.
Even though it is a repository of knowledge from the past...
These are all books on magic?!
It is even more impressive than I imagined!
Levy-san would love it here, huh?
But all of the books are so old...
Roar of the Fire Dragon!
I do not have all day to waste on you!
That is my line!
This is going to end it!
And when you succumb, I will see you plunge into a ditch!
I are not going to succumb!
I am smellin' something familiar...
A smell?
Yeah.
The smell of someone who helped me before when I had motion sickness...?
Or wait, he attacked me...?
Those are two totally different things.
Was the person a good guy or bad guy?
Alright, let us split the difference
and say he is a minor villain who acts worse than he really is.
Next time: True Evil Revisited!
So what does it smell like?
I guess the smell of black full body tights...
There is a smell for that?!
